title: Found: The Bicycle Sun Shade canopy does what it says on the tin, right?
content:
Bicycle Sun Shade propose to add a UV-resistant canopy to your bicycle, attached via a clamp at the seat tube. The company tell us it is “virtually designed to fend off sun damage without weighing down your ride”. They also say it does not act as a sail, does not put the rider off balance […]

The post Found: The Bicycle Sun Shade canopy does what it says on the tin, right? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
